sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_26e13ce6db48af00f0d9b94ffe9619eb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SR_ChangeRequestUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SR_ChangeRequestUtils</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Utility class for change request server side calls
 *
 * @class
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @extends global.module:sys_script_include
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_include
 */

var SR_ChangeRequestUtils = Class.create();
SR_ChangeRequestUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function () {
	},

	/**
	 * Default values to change request attributes
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord Current object of change request
	 * @param {String} fieldName Dictionary name to get the default value for
	 * @returns {String} Default value based on change type for the field name passed
	 */

	getChangeDefaultValue: function (changeRecord, fieldName) {
		var defaultValuesMap = {
			"normal": {
				"risk": 2,
				"impact": 1,
				"priority": 4
			},
			"standard": {
				"risk": 3,
				"impact": 3,
				"priority": 4
			},
			"emergency": {
				"risk": 3,
				"impact": 3,
				"priority": 4
			}
		};

		if (gs.nil(fieldName)) {
			return '';
		}

		var fieldValue = defaultValuesMap[changeRecord.type][fieldName];
		if (fieldValue) {
			return fieldValue;
		} else {
			return '';
		}
	},

	/**
	 * Get the Approval group based on the configuration id selected on the change request, this function called from Normal change workflow
	 *
	 * @param {Object} Current object of change request
	 * @returns {String} Sys ID of Approval Group
	 */
	getChangeApprovalGroup: function (current) {
		return current.cmdb_ci.change_control;
	},

	/**
	 * Remove the user from approvers list if he/she is requestor or if he/she already approved in previos phases
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord current object of change request
	 * @param {Object} group approval group sysid
	 * @returns {String} Sys IDs of Approval Group members
	 */
	getApproversForFourEyePrinciple: function (changeRecord, group) {

		var groupMembers = [];
		// List of users who already approved the change request
		var previousApprovers = (function () {
			var changeApprovedUsers = [];
			var changeApprovers = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
			changeApprovers.addQuery("sysapproval", changeRecord.sys_id);
			changeApprovers.addEncodedQuery("state=approved");
			changeApprovers.query();
			while (changeApprovers.next()) {
				changeApprovedUsers.push(changeApprovers.getValue("approver"));
			}
			return changeApprovedUsers;
		})();

		var approverUsers = (function () {

			var grGroupMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', group);
			grGroupMembers.addEncodedQuery("user!=" + changeRecord.requested_by);
			grGroupMembers.addQuery("user", "NOT IN", previousApprovers);
			grGroupMembers.addNotNullQuery("user");
			grGroupMembers.query();
			while (grGroupMembers.next()) {
				groupMembers.push(grGroupMembers.getValue("user"));
			}
			return groupMembers;
		})();

		return groupMembers;
	},

	/**
	 * Get all change task assignmnet group members email IDs
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord current object of change request
	 * @returns {String} Email id of chnage task assignmnet group members
	 */
	getChangeAndTaskGroupUsers: function (changeRecord) {

		var allReciepents = [];
		var changeRequestSysId = changeRecord.sys_id;
		var changeGroup = changeRecord.assignment_group;
		var changeTasks = new GlideAggregate("change_task");
		changeTasks.addQuery("change_request", changeRequestSysId);
		changeTasks.addNotNullQuery("change_request");
		changeTasks.addNotNullQuery("assignment_group");
		changeTasks.groupBy('assignment_group');
		changeTasks.query();
		while (changeTasks.next()) {

			var groupMember = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
			groupMember.addQuery("group", changeTasks.getValue("assignment_group"));
			groupMember.addNotNullQuery("group");
			groupMember.query();
			while (groupMember.next()) {
				allReciepents.push(groupMember.user.email);
			}
		}


		var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil();
		return arrayUtil.unique(allReciepents);
	},

	/**
	 * Create Approval History record
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord Glide object of change request
	 * @param {String} approvalGroupSysId Sys ID of the assignment group
	 * @param {String} approvalType Type of approval
	 * @returns {String} Sys ID of the Approval record created
	 */
	createApprovalHistory: function (changeObject, approvalGroupSysId, approvalType) {
		if (gs.nil(changeObject)) {
			return;
		}
		var changeSysId = changeObject.getValue('sys_id');
		var changeStateDV = changeObject.getDisplayValue('state');

		//Get the latest Approved/Rejected approval record details
		var latestApprovalDetails = (function () {
			var out = {
				'sys_id': '',
				'comments': ''
			};
			var approvalRec = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
			approvalRec.addQuery('sysapproval', changeSysId);
			approvalRec.addEncodedQuery('stateINapproved,rejected');
			approvalRec.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
			approvalRec.setLimit(1);
			approvalRec.query();
			if (approvalRec.next()) {
				out.sys_id = approvalRec.getValue('sys_id');
				//Get the last added comment from the comments field
				out.comments = (function () {
					var comm = approvalRec.comments.getJournalEntry(1);
					if (comm) {
						return comm.split('\n').filter(function (elm) {
							return elm.indexOf('(Comments)') == -1;
						}).join('\n');
						//return comm.split('\n\n')[0].split('\n')[1];
					} else {
						return '';
					}
				})();
			}
			return out;
		})();

		try {
			new x_swre_tsk_history.SRApprovalHistory().createApprovalHistory(
				changeSysId, 
				latestApprovalDetails.sys_id, 
				approvalGroupSysId, 
				changeStateDV, 
				approvalType, 
				latestApprovalDetails.comments
			);
		}
		catch (e) {

		}

	},

	/**
	 * Validate CTask Planned start date should fall in between change request planned dates
	 * 
	 * @param {any} changeTask
	 * @returns {Boolean} 
	 */
	isValidPlannedStartDate: function(changeTask) {

		var plannedStartDate = new GlideDateTime(changeTask.getValue('planned_start_date'));
		var startDate = new GlideDateTime(changeTask.change_request.start_date);

		var ctaskDateinSeconds = parseInt(plannedStartDate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		var changeDateinSeconds = parseInt(startDate.getNumericValue())/1000;

		return (parseInt(ctaskDateinSeconds)-parseInt(changeDateinSeconds)) < 0;
	},

	/**
	 * Validate CTask Planned End date should fall in between change request planned dates
	 * 
	 * @param {any} changeTask
	 * @returns {Boolean} 
	 */
	isValidPlannedEndDate : function(changeTask) {

		var plannedEndDate =new GlideDateTime(changeTask.getValue('planned_end_date'));
		var endDate =new GlideDateTime(changeTask.change_request.end_date);


		var ctaskDateinSeconds = parseInt(plannedEndDate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		var changeDateinSeconds = parseInt(endDate.getNumericValue())/1000;

		return (parseInt(changeDateinSeconds)-parseInt(ctaskDateinSeconds)) < 0 ;
	},


	type: 'SR_ChangeRequestUtils'
};

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-23 16:41:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>26e13ce6db48af00f0d9b94ffe9619eb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>58</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR_ChangeRequestUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_26e13ce6db48af00f0d9b94ffe9619eb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-26 13:13:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_list_control_986553fb0a0006417a879dc40c0d683a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ui_list_control"><sys_ui_list_control action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><columns_condition/><edit_condition><![CDATA[answer = !parent.active;]]></edit_condition><edit_default_filter/><edit_roles/><empty_condition/><filter_condition/><filter_roles/><hierarchical_lists>false</hierarchical_lists><label>Change Tasks</label><link_condition/><link_roles/><list_edit_insert_row>false</list_edit_insert_row><list_edit_ref_qual_tag/><list_edit_type/><name>change_request</name><new_condition><![CDATA[//Hide New button if Change state is not New(-5),Assess(-4) and Authorize(-3) or Change is inactive
answer = (function () {
	if (!parent.active){
		return true;	
	}else{
		var validChangeState = ['-5', '-4', '-3'];
		var changeState = parent.getValue('state');
		if (validChangeState.indexOf(changeState) === -1) {
			return true;
		}
	}
})();

]]></new_condition><new_roles/><omit_columns_if_empty>false</omit_columns_if_empty><omit_drilldown_link>false</omit_drilldown_link><omit_edit_button>false</omit_edit_button><omit_filters>false</omit_filters><omit_if_empty>false</omit_if_empty><omit_links>false</omit_links><omit_new_button>false</omit_new_button><related_list>change_task.change_request</related_list><sys_class_name>sys_ui_list_control</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-04-27 19:18:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>986553fb0a0006417a879dc40c0d683a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>change_request</sys_name><sys_overrides display_value="">global</sys_overrides><sys_package display_value="Upgrade content for 2011 - activated only for new instances" source="upgrade.2011_common_practice">94976d5fdbc0330025975858dc961931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_list_control_986553fb0a0006417a879dc40c0d683a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-27 15:06:25</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_list_control></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">end_dateVALCHANGES^end_dateISNOTEMPTY^NQstart_dateVALCHANGES^start_dateISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Planned start and End date validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate planned start date should be future and planned end date should be after planned start date
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// Add your code here
	var isValidStartDate = (function() {
		var startdate = new GlideDateTime(current.start_date.getDisplayValue());
		startdate.getDisplayValue();
		
		var currentdate =new GlideDateTime(gs.nowDateTime());
		currentdate.getDisplayValue();
		
		var sdateinseconds = parseInt(startdate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		var cdateinseconds = parseInt(currentdate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		
		return (parseInt(sdateinseconds)-parseInt(cdateinseconds)) < 0;
	})();
	
	var isValidEndDate = (function() {
		var endDate =new GlideDateTime(current.end_date.getDisplayValue());
		
		var startDate =new GlideDateTime(current.start_date.getDisplayValue());
		
		var endDateinSeconds = parseInt(endDate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		var startDateinSeconds = parseInt(startDate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		return (parseInt(endDateinSeconds)-parseInt(startDateinSeconds)) < 0;
	})();
	
	if(isValidStartDate) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("Start date should be future date");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
	
	if(isValidEndDate) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("End date should be after start date");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
	
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-25 08:51:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b6fffc8ddb3c2f007193f7b31d961910</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Planned start and End date validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b6fffc8ddb3c2f007193f7b31d961910</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-15 12:03:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b6fffc8ddb3c2f007193f7b31d961910"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_email_f8226628dbc5b3405a31fd161d961959
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>SRUpdatedbyname</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(/* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
          /* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
          /* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {

	//Get updated by User name 
	var userId = current.sys_updated_by; 
	var userName = (function () {
		var grUserName = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); 
		grUserName.addQuery('user_name', userId);  
		grUserName.query();   
		if (grUserName.next()){                                                                        
			return grUserName.getValue('name');                           
		}else {
			return '';
		}
	})();

	template.print(userName);

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4GRV8</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-23 09:23:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>f8226628dbc5b3405a31fd161d961959</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRUpdatedbyname</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_f8226628dbc5b3405a31fd161d961959</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-29 12:12:25</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_5eab2cf09f3331002920bde8132e7095
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ChangeUtils</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Customer extensible Class of ChangeUtilsSNC . Customers can override the public methods of ChangeUtilsSNC for their own business needs.</description><name>ChangeUtils</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Customer extensible Class of ChangeUtilsSNC . Customers can override the public methods of ChangeUtilsSNC for their own business needs.
 * 
 * @class 
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @extends global.module:sys_script_include.ChangeUtilsSNC
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_include
 */
var ChangeUtils = Class.create();
ChangeUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(ChangeUtilsSNC, /** @lends global.module:sys_script_include.ChangeUtils.prototype */ {
	
    /**
     * Default Constructor
     * 
     * @param {object} request
     * @param {object} responseXML
     * @param {object} gc
     * @returns {undefined}
     */
    initialize: function (request, responseXML, gc) {
        ChangeUtilsSNC.prototype.initialize.call(this, request, responseXML, gc);
		
    },

  

    /**
     * Overriding OOB method to exclude Canceled Change tasks getting created via Copy Change UI action
     * 
     * @param {string} srcParentSysId Source Parent sys id
     * @param {string} targetParentSysId Target Parent sys id
     * @param {string} table Table name
     * @param {string} key
     * @param {string} parentAttr
     * @param {Array} copyAttrs
     * @param {any} copyAttachments
     * @param {any} copyChildRelatedLists
     * @returns {undefined}
     */
    makeRelatedTableCopy: function ( /*String*/ srcParentSysId,
        /*String*/ targetParentSysId,
        /*String*/ table,
        /*String*/ key, /*If provided, used to prevent duplicate rows*/
        /*String*/ parentAttr,
        /*Array*/ copyAttrs,
        /*Boolean*/ copyAttachments,
        /*CSV String*/ copyChildRelatedLists) {
        if (!copyChildRelatedLists)
            copyChildRelatedLists = [];
        else
            copyChildRelatedLists = this.getCsvValue(copyChildRelatedLists);

        var ans = [];
        copyAttrs = this.arrayUtil.diff(copyAttrs, this.ALWAYS_IGNORE_ATTRS, [
   parentAttr
  ]);
        var srcGr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
        if (srcGr.isValid()) {
            var existingRecords = [];
            srcGr.addQuery(parentAttr, srcParentSysId);
            srcGr.query();
            if (key) {
                existingRecords = this._getTargetRelatedRecordKeys(table, key,
                    parentAttr, targetParentSysId);
            }
            while (srcGr.next()) {
                if (key && this.arrayUtil.contains(existingRecords, srcGr.getValue(key))) {
					continue;
				}
				// Below condition changed to exclude Cancelled change tasks
				// Canceled state value is 4
                if ((table == this.CHANGE_TASK) && (srcGr.getValue(this.TASK_CREATED_FROM).indexOf(this.TASK_CREATED_FROM_WORKFLOW) > -1 || (srcGr.getValue('state') == 4)) || (srcGr.getValue('change_task_type') == 'manual_fix')) {
					continue;
				}
                var newSysId = this._makeRelatedRecordCopy(srcGr, copyAttrs,
                    parentAttr, targetParentSysId);
                if (newSysId) {
                    ans.push(newSysId);

                    if (copyAttachments)
                        this._copyAttachments(srcGr, newSysId);

                    for (var i = 0; i < copyChildRelatedLists.length; ++i) {
                        var relatedTable = copyChildRelatedLists[i];
                        var newAns = this._makeRelatedTableCopy(srcGr.getUniqueValue(),
                            newSysId, relatedTable);
                        if (!this._isSet(newAns)) {
                            this.log.logWarning('makeRelatedTableCopy: Could not copy related\'s related table ' +
                                relatedTable);
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    this.log.logWarning('makeRelatedTableCopy: Could not copy related table ' + table);
                }
            }
            return ans;
        } else {
            this.log.logWarning('makeRelatedTableCopy: Invalid table ' + table);
        }
    },


    type: 'ChangeUtils'
});

/*
 * ******************************************************************
 * The function below is written in this way to provide access via the
 * signature ChangeUtils.isCopyChangeEnabled() from UI Action -
 * 'Copy Change' > Condition.
 * 
 * Customers are suggested to override methods inside the body of
 * ChangeUtils' object definition.
 * ******************************************************************
 */
ChangeUtils.isCopyChangeEnabled = function (current) {

    var changeUtils = new ChangeUtils();

    if (changeUtils.isCopyFlagValid() && changeUtils.isCopyRulesValid(current)) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }

};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-04-30 18:22:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>5eab2cf09f3331002920bde8132e7095</sys_id><sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ChangeUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Change Request" source="com.snc.change_request">3745ad9fdb80330025975858dc961949</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5eab2cf09f3331002920bde8132e7095</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-19 13:09:22</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri>/api/swre/changes</default_operation_uri><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Create Normal Change</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    // implement resource here
    return new SRChangeRequestInbound(request, response).createNormalChange();
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/swre/v1/changes</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-21 09:31:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>1dcecd89dbaa6f005a31fd161d96193b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Normal Change</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1dcecd89dbaa6f005a31fd161d96193b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-21 11:26:28</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="changes">5d0e4989dbaa6f005a31fd161d9619f0</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">fd29a9c9dbea6f005a31fd161d9619b2</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_762459bfdb96ab005a31fd161d961928
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">type=normal^stateCHANGESTO-1^EQ<item endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="normal"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="-1"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Validate before moving to Implement</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Check for Planned dates filled and Deployment task attached to Auto CTask before change request state moves to Implement
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

	//Store Change Sys ID
	var changeSysId = current.getValue('sys_id');
	
	//Check if Planned start and end dates are populated in all related Change Tasks
	var plannedDatesPopulated = (function () {
		var changeTask = new GlideRecord("change_task");
		changeTask.addQuery("change_request", changeSysId);
		changeTask.addActiveQuery();
		changeTask.addEncodedQuery("planned_start_dateISEMPTY^ORplanned_end_dateISEMPTY");
		changeTask.setLimit(1);
		changeTask.query();
		if (changeTask.next()) {
			return false;
		} else {
			return true;
		}
	})();
	
	//Abort action and return if Planned dates are not populated
	if (!plannedDatesPopulated) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("Please enter planned dates for all the Change tasks before the Change request moves to the Implement state.");
        current.setAbortAction(true);
		return;
	}
	
	//Get the Number of all Automated Change Tasks
	var autoChangeTasks = (function () {
		var out = [];
		var autoChangeTask = new GlideRecord("change_task");
        autoChangeTask.addQuery("change_request", changeSysId);
        autoChangeTask.addActiveQuery();
        autoChangeTask.addEncodedQuery("planned_start_dateISNOTEMPTY^planned_end_dateISNOTEMPTY^change_task_typeINtesting_automated,implementation_automated");
        autoChangeTask.query();
        while (autoChangeTask.next()) {
            out.push(autoChangeTask.getValue('number'));
        }
		return out;
	})();
	
	//Check if an active automated task is linked to the Change task
	var invalidAutoChangeTasks = autoChangeTasks.filter(function (autoChangeTaskNumber) {
		var autoTask = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_task');
		autoTask.addActiveQuery();
		autoTask.addQuery('parent.number', autoChangeTaskNumber);
		autoTask.query();
		return !autoTask.next();
	});
	
	//Abort action if there is any Automated Change task without a related automated task
	if (invalidAutoChangeTasks.length > 0) {
		var errorMsg = gs.getMessage('Please attach deployment task to {0} before moving the Change Request to Implement', [invalidAutoChangeTasks.join()]);
		gs.addErrorMessage(errorMsg);
        current.setAbortAction(true);
        //action.setRedirectURL(current);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-17 13:03:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>762459bfdb96ab005a31fd161d961928</sys_id><sys_mod_count>54</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Validate before moving to Implement</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_762459bfdb96ab005a31fd161d961928</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-13 12:39:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=762459bfdb96ab005a31fd161d961928"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>762459bfdb96ab005a31fd161d961928</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-20 11:24:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad3f90b4dbae2f005a31fd161d9619af</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-12-20 11:24:55</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1579f00ddb54b3407193f7b31d9619b8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition>!current.isNewRecord()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">stateIN-5,-4^type=normal^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="-5,-4"/><item endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="normal"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Show message if no CTask attached</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Check for CTask attached to the Change ,If not Display message to attach CTask
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	
    //Store Change Sys ID
    var changeSysId = current.getValue('sys_id');

    // Check CTask is attached to the change 
    var isCTaskAttached = (function () {
        var changeTask = new GlideRecord("change_task");
        changeTask.addQuery('change_request',changeSysId);
        changeTask.query();
        if (changeTask.hasNext()) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    })();

    if (!isCTaskAttached) {
        gs.addInfoMessage("Please attach a CTASK before proceeding");
    }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-18 08:00:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1579f00ddb54b3407193f7b31d9619b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Show message if no CTask attached</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1579f00ddb54b3407193f7b31d9619b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-19 12:07:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1579f00ddb54b3407193f7b31d9619b8"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>1579f00ddb54b3407193f7b31d9619b8</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-18 08:00:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>4b6c700ddb54b3407193f7b31d9619f5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-18 08:00:55</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d8e4b5b1dbb1b3007193f7b31d961978
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Add/Remove Group members/Managers">892771c9dbbc2f007193f7b31d9619f5</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:98f9310ddbbc2f007193f7b31d961931</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>SR-Set Requested Action</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Requested Action
 * 
 * @param {any} control
 * @param {any} oldValue
 * @param {any} newValue
 * @param {any} isLoading
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @memberof global.module:catalog_script_client
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var groupAjax = new GlideAjax('SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getRequestedAction');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupName', g_form.getValue('var_group_name'));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupMembersVariable', newValue.toString().split(','));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupManager', g_form.getValue('var_current_manager'));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_requestedAction', g_form.getValue('requested_action'));
	groupAjax.getXML(setRequestedAction);

	/**
	 * Callback function to set requested action
	 * 
	 * @param {any} response
	 * @returns {undefined}
	 */
	function setRequestedAction(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		g_form.setValue('requested_action', answer);

	}	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-03 09:57:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d8e4b5b1dbb1b3007193f7b31d961978</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR-Set Requested Action</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d8e4b5b1dbb1b3007193f7b31d961978</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-12 07:58:59</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_46fb5aa2db3f2b407193f7b31d9619c7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">change_task_typeCHANGESFROMimplementation_automated^ORchange_task_typeCHANGESFROMtesting_automated^change_request.type=normal^EQ<item endquery="false" field="change_task_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESFROM" or="false" value="implementation_automated"/><item endquery="false" field="change_task_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESFROM" or="true" value="testing_automated"/><item endquery="false" field="change_request.type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="normal"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Avoid editing the type field</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/*
 * Avoid changing the type of CTask,if it has an auto task attached
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Dhanalakshmi K [S4GRV8]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var autoTask = new GlideAggregate("x_swre_auto_task");
    autoTask.addQuery("parent", current.getValue("sys_id"));
    autoTask.addQuery('active=true');
    autoTask.query();
    if (autoTask.next()) {
        current.setAbortAction(true);
        gs.addErrorMessage("Cannot change CTask type as there's already an automated task attached to this");
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4GRV8</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-26 10:25:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>46fb5aa2db3f2b407193f7b31d9619c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Avoid editing the type field</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_46fb5aa2db3f2b407193f7b31d9619c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-11 06:19:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=46fb5aa2db3f2b407193f7b31d9619c7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1053e2f5dbc9a7007193f7b31d961971
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">assignment_groupVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Update interested group list</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Populate Interested group from all change task to change record
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// Add your code here
	var allAssignmentGroups = [];
	var changeTaskRecord = new GlideAggregate('change_task');
	changeTaskRecord.addQuery('change_request',current.change_request);
	changeTaskRecord.addAggregate('COUNT','assignment_group');
	changeTaskRecord.query();
	while (changeTaskRecord.next()) {
		
		allAssignmentGroups.push(changeTaskRecord.getValue("assignment_group"));
	}
	var chnageRequest = new GlideRecord("change_request");
	chnageRequest.addQuery("sys_id", current.change_request);
	chnageRequest.query();
	if (chnageRequest.next()) {
		chnageRequest.setValue("group_list", allAssignmentGroups.toString());
		chnageRequest.update();
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-10 10:14:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1053e2f5dbc9a7007193f7b31d961971</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Update interested group list</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1053e2f5dbc9a7007193f7b31d961971</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-15 12:08:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1053e2f5dbc9a7007193f7b31d961971"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0621150ddbaa6f005a31fd161d961992
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SRChangeRequestInbound</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SRChangeRequestInbound</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Change request Inbound script to create chaneg request from 3 rd party tools
 *
 * @class
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @requires sn_ws_err.module:sys_script_include.BadRequestError
 * @requires sn_ws_err.module:sys_script_include.ServiceError
 * @requires sn_ws_err.module:sys_script_include.NotFoundError
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_include
 */
var SRChangeRequestInbound = Class.create();
SRChangeRequestInbound.prototype = /** @lends global.module:sys_script_include.SRChangeRequestInbound.prototype */ {
    /**
     * Description
     *
     * @param {any} request
     * @param {any} response
     * @returns {undefined}
     */
    initialize: function (request, response) {
        var self = this;

        self.request = request;
        self.response = response;
    },

    /**
     * Create change request
     *
     * @returns {Object} JSON objectof change request
     */
    createNormalChange: function () {

        var self = this,
            mandatoryAttributes = [
                "correlationId",
                "requestedBy",
                "configurationItem",
                "shortDescription",
                "risk",
                "impact"
            ],
            attributeMap = {
                "correlationId": "correlation_id",
                "requestedBy": "requested_by",
                "category": "category",
                "configurationItem": "cmdb_ci",
                "shortDescription": "short_description",
                "description": "description",
                "priority": "priority",
                "risk": "risk",
                "impact": "impact",
                "justification": "justification",
                "implementationPlan": "implementation_plan",
                "riskAndImpactAnalysis": "risk_impact_analysis",
                "backoutPlan": "backout_plan",
                "testPlan": "test_plan",
                "plannedStartDate": "start_date",
                "plannedEndDate": "end_date",
                "cabRequired": "cab_required"
            },
            validPriorityValue = {
                "1 - Critical": 1,
                "2 - High": 2,
                "3 - Moderate": 3,
                "4 - Low": 4
            },
            validImpactValue = {
                "1 - High": 1,
                "2 - Medium": 2,
                "3 - Low": 3
            },
            validRiskValue = {
                "Very High": 1,
                "High": 2,
                "Moderate": 3,
                "Low": 4,
                "None ": 5

            };
        var requestBody = self.request.body;

        var body = requestBody.nextEntry();
        /**
         * Get watch list user sysid using emailid or user id
         *
         * @returns {String} Watch list user sysids by commma sepearated
         */
        var watchListString = (function () {
            var watchList = body.watchList;
            if (JSUtil.notNil(watchList)) {
                var watchListUsers = watchList.map(function (watchlistVal) {
                    var userQuery = (function () {
                        var qry = 'email=' + watchlistVal + '^ORuser_name=' + watchlistVal;
                        return qry;
                    })();
                    var user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
                    user.addEncodedQuery(userQuery);
                    user.query();
                    if (user.next()) {
                        return user.getValue('sys_id');
                    } else {
                        return '';
                    }
                });
                return watchListUsers.join();
            } else {
                return '';
            }
        })();

        /**
         * Get COnfiguration Item sysid using name
         *
         * @returns {String} sysid of configuration item
         */
        var configurationItemSysId = (function () {

            var configurationItemName = body.configurationItem;
            if (JSUtil.notNil(configurationItemName)) {
                var configurationID = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci");
                configurationID.addQuery("name", configurationItemName);
                configurationID.addNotNullQuery("name");
                configurationID.setLimit(1);
                configurationID.query();
                if (configurationID.next()) {
                    return configurationID.getValue("sys_id");
                }
            } else {
                return "";
            }

        })();

        /**
         * Get group sysid using name
         *
         * @returns {String} sysid of group
         */
        var assignmentGroupSysId = (function () {

            var assignmentGroupName = body.assignmentGroup;
            if (JSUtil.notNil(assignmentGroupName)) {
                var group = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
                group.addQuery("name", assignmentGroupName);
                group.addNotNullQuery("name");
                group.setLimit(1);
                group.query();
                if (group.next()) {
                    return group.getValue("sys_id");
                }
            } else {
                return "";
            }

        })();

        // Verify all attributes passed in json body
        var missingMandatoryAttributes = mandatoryAttributes.filter(function (attribute) {
            return body.hasOwnProperty(attribute) == false;
        });

        if (missingMandatoryAttributes.length > 0) {
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('Missing mandatory attributes: ' + missingMandatoryAttributes.join());
        }
        // Verify all mandatory attribute data is passed
        var missingMandatoryData = mandatoryAttributes.filter(function (attribute) {
            return JSUtil.nil(body[attribute]) == true;
        });

        if (missingMandatoryData.length > 0) {
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('Missing mandatory attributes data: ' + missingMandatoryData.join());
        }

        if (gs.nil(validRiskValue[body.risk])) {
            return sn_ws_err.BadRequestError("Invalid risk :"+body.risk);
        }

        if (gs.nil(validImpactValue[body.impact])) {
            return sn_ws_err.BadRequestError("Invalid impact :"+body.impact);
        }

        if (JSUtil.nil(configurationItemSysId)) {
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('Invalid configuration item '+body.configurationItem);
        }

        // Create change request
        try {
            var changeRequest = new GlideRecord("change_request");
            changeRequest.initialize();
            for (var key in body) {
                changeRequest.setValue(attributeMap[key], body[key]);
            }
            changeRequest.setValue("watch_list", watchListString);
            changeRequest.setValue("assignment_group", assignmentGroupSysId);
            changeRequest.insert();
            var errorMessage = changeRequest.getLastErrorMessage();
            if (gs.nil(errorMessage)) {
                return this._getSuccessResponse(changeRequest);
            } else {
                throw errorMessage;
            }
        } catch (e) {

            var myError = new sn_ws_err.ServiceError();
            myError.setStatus(403);
            myError.setDetail(e);
            myError.setMessage("Operation Failed");
            return myError;
        }

    },

    /**
     * Update work notes of change record
     *
     * returns {Object} JSON objectof change request
     */
    updateWorkNotes: function () {

        var self = this,
            workNotes;

        var changeRequestNumber = self.request.pathParams.changeNumber;

        if (JSUtil.nil(changeRequestNumber)) {
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('changeNumber not passed');
        }

        var requestBody = self.request.body;

        var body = requestBody.nextEntry();
        workNotes = body.workNote || null;
        if (gs.nil(workNotes))
            return new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError('initialize: workNote property not found');

        var qry = (function () {
            return 'number=' + changeRequestNumber + '^ORsys_id=' + changeRequestNumber;
        })();
        try {
            var changeRequest = new GlideRecord('change_request');
            changeRequest.addEncodedQuery(qry);
            changeRequest.addNotNullQuery("number");
            changeRequest.query();
            if (changeRequest.next()) {
                changeRequest.work_notes = workNotes;
                changeRequest.update();

                var errorMessage = changeRequest.getLastErrorMessage();
                if (gs.nil(errorMessage)) {
                    return this._getSuccessResponse(changeRequest);
                } else {
                    throw errorMessage;
                }

            } else {
                return new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError('Could not find change request with number:' + changeRequestNumber);
            }
        } catch (e) {

            var myError = new sn_ws_err.ServiceError();
            myError.setStatus(403);
            myError.setDetail(e);
            myError.setMessage("Operation Failed");
            return myError;
        }

    },

    /**
     * create Output response object to rest calls
     *
     * @param {Object} changeObject change record glideRecord object
     * @returns {Object} out
     */
    _getSuccessResponse: function (changeObject) {


        var out = {
            "number": changeObject.getDisplayValue("number"),
            "createdBy": changeObject.getDisplayValue("sys_created_by"),
            "requestedBy": changeObject.getDisplayValue("requested_by"),
            "category": changeObject.getDisplayValue("category"),
            "configurationItem": changeObject.getDisplayValue("cmdb_ci"),
            "shortDescription": changeObject.getDisplayValue("short_description"),
            "description": changeObject.getDisplayValue("description"),
            "priority": changeObject.getDisplayValue("priority"),
            "risk": changeObject.getDisplayValue("risk"),
            "impact": changeObject.getDisplayValue("impact"),
            "approval": changeObject.getDisplayValue("approval"),
            "type": changeObject.getDisplayValue("type"),
            "state": changeObject.getDisplayValue("state"),
            "conflictStatus": changeObject.getDisplayValue("conflict_status"),
            "conflictLastRun": changeObject.getDisplayValue("conflict_last_run"),
            "assignmentGroup": changeObject.getDisplayValue("assignment_group"),
            "assignedTo": changeObject.getDisplayValue("assigned_to"),
            "justification": changeObject.getDisplayValue("justification"),
            "implementationPlan": changeObject.getDisplayValue("implementation_plan"),
            "riskAndImpactAnalysis": changeObject.getDisplayValue("risk_impact_analysis"),
            "backoutPlan": changeObject.getDisplayValue("backout_plan"),
            "testPlan": changeObject.getDisplayValue("test_plan"),
            "plannedStartDate": changeObject.getDisplayValue("start_date"),
            "plannedEndDate": changeObject.getDisplayValue("end_date"),
            "actualStartDate": changeObject.getDisplayValue("work_start"),
            "actualEndDate": changeObject.getDisplayValue("work_end"),
            "cabRequired": changeObject.getDisplayValue("cab_required"),
            "cabDelegate": changeObject.getDisplayValue("cab_delegate"),
            "closeCode": changeObject.getDisplayValue("close_code"),
            "closeNotes": changeObject.getDisplayValue("close_notes"),
            "sysId": changeObject.getDisplayValue("sys_id"),
            "watchList": (function () {
                var watchList = changeObject.getValue("watch_list");
                if (JSUtil.notNil(watchList)) {
                    var watchListUsers = [];
                    var user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
                    user.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", watchList);
                    user.addNotNullQuery("sys_id");
                    user.query();
                    while (user.next()) {
                        var watchListUser = {};
                        watchListUser.userId = user.getValue("user_name");
                        watchListUser.email = user.getValue("email");
                        watchListUser.fullName = user.getValue("name");
                        watchListUsers.push(watchListUser);
                    }
                    return watchListUsers;
                }
            })()
        };

        return out;

    },

    type: 'SRChangeRequestInbound'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-21 09:42:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>0621150ddbaa6f005a31fd161d961992</sys_id><sys_mod_count>135</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRChangeRequestInbound</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0621150ddbaa6f005a31fd161d961992</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>s02w42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-07 10:10:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual) {

})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_bde5b452db49e7007193f7b31d9619c0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Add/Remove Group members/Managers">892771c9dbbc2f007193f7b31d9619f5</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:5bf8318ddbbc2f007193f7b31d96192a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>SR - Retrive group members and manager</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set group members and manager based on the group selected
 *
 * @param {any} control
 * @param {any} oldValue
 * @param {any} newValue
 * @param {any} isLoading
 * @param {any} isTemplate
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_client
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
		return;
	}

	var groupAjax = new GlideAjax('SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getGroupDetails');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_group', newValue);
	groupAjax.getXML(function (response) {

		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		var output = JSON.parse(answer);
		if (output.hasOwnProperty('groupMembers')) {
			if(output.hasOwnProperty('groupManager')){
				var groupMembersWithoutManager = output.groupMembers.split(',').filter((function(el) {
					return el != output.groupManager;
				}));
				g_form.setValue('var_group_members', groupMembersWithoutManager);
			}else{
				g_form.setValue('var_group_members', output.groupMembers);
			}
		}

		if (output.hasOwnProperty('groupManager')) {
			g_form.setValue('var_current_manager', output.groupManager);
		}		
	});

}				 

]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-11 15:21:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bde5b452db49e7007193f7b31d9619c0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>48</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Retrive group members and manager</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bde5b452db49e7007193f7b31d9619c0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-17 13:00:57</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_45621559dbce67007193f7b31d9619ab
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">orderISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="order" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Update Order number</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Update Order when the Order value is empty
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var nextOrder = (function() {
            var changeTask = new GlideAggregate("change_task");
            changeTask.addQuery("change_request", current.change_request);
            changeTask.addAggregate('MAX', 'order');
            changeTask.groupBy("change_request");
            changeTask.query();
            if (changeTask.next()) {
                var newOrder = 100;
                var order = parseInt(changeTask.getAggregate('MAX', 'order'));
                if (order >= 100) {
                    var rem = 0;
                    rem = order % 100;
                    if (rem == 0) {
                        newOrder = (order / 1) + 100;
                    } else {
                        newOrder = order / 100;
                        newOrder = Math.round((Math.ceil(newOrder)) * 100);
                    }
                }
                return newOrder;
            } else {
                return 100;
            }
        })();
	
	 current.order = nextOrder;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-27 07:56:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>45621559dbce67007193f7b31d9619ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Update Order number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_45621559dbce67007193f7b31d9619ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 07:57:34</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=45621559dbce67007193f7b31d9619ab"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ec2fc847db3063005a31fd161d961982
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">planned_start_dateISNOTEMPTY^planned_start_dateVALCHANGES^change_task_type!=manual_fix^NQplanned_end_dateISNOTEMPTY^planned_end_dateVALCHANGES^change_task_type!=manual_fix^EQ<item endquery="false" field="planned_start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="planned_start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="change_task_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="manual_fix"/><item endquery="false" field="planned_end_date" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="planned_end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="change_task_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="manual_fix"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Validate planned start and end date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * To validate change task dates should fall in between change request planned dates
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here

	var isPlannedStartValid = new SR_ChangeRequestUtils().isValidPlannedStartDate(current);
	if(isPlannedStartValid) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("Start date should be after change request planned start date");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

	var isPlannedEndDateValid = new SR_ChangeRequestUtils().isValidPlannedEndDate(current);
	if(isPlannedEndDateValid) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("End date should be before change planned end date");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-01 10:23:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ec2fc847db3063005a31fd161d961982</sys_id><sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Validate planned start and end date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ec2fc847db3063005a31fd161d961982</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-25 09:53:23</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ec2fc847db3063005a31fd161d961982"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_7afd2749db0567005a31fd161d961973
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow write for records in change_request, for users with role itil, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>change_request</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[// CHeck if user is member of interested groups, this Interested group set using Business rule : SR - Update interested group list
var isUserMemberOfInterestedGroups = (function () {
	var groups = current.group_list;
	var curUser = gs.getUser();
	return groups.split(",").some(function (group) {
		return curUser.isMemberOf(group.toString());
	});
})();

var changeApprover = (function () {
	var changeApprovalUsers = [];
	var curUser = gs.getUser();
	var grChangeApprovers = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
	grChangeApprovers.addQuery('sysapproval', current.getValue('sys_id'));
	grChangeApprovers.addEncodedQuery('state=requested');
	grChangeApprovers.query();
	while (grChangeApprovers.next()) {
		changeApprovalUsers.push(grChangeApprovers.getValue('approver'));
	}
	return changeApprovalUsers;
})();


answer = (function () {
	var changeState = current.state;
	var currentUser = gs.getUser();
	var currentUserId = gs.getUserID();

	var changeConfigurationItem = current.cmdb_ci;
	if (current.isNewRecord() || changeState == "-5") {
		// allow write access to all ITIL users in new state
		return true;
	} else if (currentUser.isMemberOf(changeConfigurationItem.assignment_group) || currentUser.isMemberOf(current.assignment_group)) {
		// Change request configuration CM group and assignment group change request can edit change in all states
		return true;
	} else if ((currentUser.isMemberOf(changeConfigurationItem.support_group) || isUserMemberOfInterestedGroups) && (changeState == "-2" || changeState == "-1")) {
		// chnage request IPL group or change task assignment group member can edit in scheduled and Implement states
		return true;
	} else if ((changeApprover.indexOf(currentUserId) != -1) && (changeState == "-3")) {
		// Change request APR approver can edit the record in Authorize state
		return true;
	} else {
		return false;
	}
})();

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-08 07:33:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>7afd2749db0567005a31fd161d961973</sys_id><sys_mod_count>55</sys_mod_count><sys_name>change_request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_7afd2749db0567005a31fd161d961973</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-06 14:19:31</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fb930ea4db4477007193f7b31d9619f7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">change_task_type=manual_fix^EQ<item endquery="false" field="change_task_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="manual_fix"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Manual task display message</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * To create a info message for mannual fixed task to check if any date/time conflicts and store warning message in g_scratchpad
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Dhanalakshmi K [S4GRV8]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

	var manualFixedTaskNumber = current.getValue('number');

	var changeTasks = (function () {
		var out = [];
		var grChangeTask = new GlideRecord('change_task');
		grChangeTask.addEncodedQuery('created_fromLIKE' + manualFixedTaskNumber);
		grChangeTask.query();
		while (grChangeTask.next()) {
			out.push(grChangeTask.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return out;
	})();

	var getAutoTasks = (function () {
		var out = [];
		var grAutoTask = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_task');
		grAutoTask.addQuery('active', true);
		grAutoTask.addQuery('parent', 'IN', changeTasks.join());
		grAutoTask.addNotNullQuery('parent');
		grAutoTask.query();
		while (grAutoTask.next()) {
			out.push(grAutoTask.getValue('number'));
		}
		return out;
	})();

	g_scratchpad.infoMessage = gs.getMessage("If the {0} and {1} fall outside the planned Change window, the Change Manager or the Implementer has to check for any conflicts manually and get them resolved before proceeding", [manualFixedTaskNumber ,getAutoTasks.join()]);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4GRV8</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-04 13:54:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fb930ea4db4477007193f7b31d9619f7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>46</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Manual task display message</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fb930ea4db4477007193f7b31d9619f7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-22 10:29:04</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fb930ea4db4477007193f7b31d9619f7"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>fb930ea4db4477007193f7b31d9619f7</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-01 10:50:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>ed79e92ddba873807193f7b31d9619e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-01 10:50:21</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_1226b811db8567007193f7b31d96198d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>itil role required to write to change_task records</description><name>change_task</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = (function () {

	var changeRequest = current.change_request;
	var changeRequestState = changeRequest.state;
	var currentUser = gs.getUser();
	var currentUserId = currentUser.getID()+ '';

	var changeApprover = (function () {
		var changeApprovalUsers = [];
		var grChangeApprovers = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
		grChangeApprovers.addQuery('sysapproval', changeRequest.getValue('sys_id'));
		grChangeApprovers.addEncodedQuery('state=requested');
		grChangeApprovers.query();
		while (grChangeApprovers.next()) {
			changeApprovalUsers.push(grChangeApprovers.getValue('approver'));
		}
		return changeApprovalUsers;
	})();


	if (current.isNewRecord() || changeRequestState == "-5") {
		// allow write access to all ITIL users in new state
		return true;
	} else if (currentUser.isMemberOf(changeRequest.cmdb_ci.assignment_group) || currentUser.isMemberOf(changeRequest.assignment_group)) {
		// Change request configuration CM group and assignment group of change request can edit change in all states
		return true;
	} else if ((currentUser.isMemberOf(changeRequest.cmdb_ci.support_group) || currentUser.isMemberOf(current.assignment_group)) && (changeRequestState == "-2" || changeRequestState == "-1")) {
		// Change request configuration item IPL group and assignment group of change task can edit in Scheduled and implenet states
		return true;
	} else if ((changeApprover.indexOf(currentUserId) !=-1) && (changeRequestState == "-3")) {
		// Change request APR approver can edit the record in Authorize state
		return true;
	} else {
		return false;
	}
})();

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-08 12:47:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>1226b811db8567007193f7b31d96198d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>43</sys_mod_count><sys_name>change_task</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_1226b811db8567007193f7b31d96198d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-06 14:19:18</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
