sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">stateCHANGESTO4^type=normal^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="4"/><item endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="normal"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Cancel chnage tasks</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Cancel change tasks when change record cancel
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var changeTaskRecord = new GlideRecord("change_task");
    changeTaskRecord.addQuery("change_request", current.sys_id);
    changeTaskRecord.addNotNullQuery("change_request");
    changeTaskRecord.query();
    while (changeTaskRecord.next()) {
        changeTaskRecord.setValue("state", "4");
        changeTaskRecord.update();
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-10 15:43:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>997a5bb3db292b007193f7b31d96191b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Cancel chnage tasks</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_997a5bb3db292b007193f7b31d96191b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-28 08:14:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=997a5bb3db292b007193f7b31d96191b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_email_a39fb8f6dbe42b007193f7b31d961990
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>SRChangeAndTaskReciepents</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Send mail to assignment group members of change task in CC
 * 
 * @method runMailScript
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_email
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function runMailScript(/* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
/* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
/* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {
	
	// Add your code here

	var ccUsers = new SR_ChangeRequestUtils().getChangeAndTaskGroupUsers(current);
	ccUsers.forEach(function (emialId) {
		email.addAddress("cc", emialId, "");
	});

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-18 08:50:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>a39fb8f6dbe42b007193f7b31d961990</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SRChangeAndTaskReciepents</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_a39fb8f6dbe42b007193f7b31d961990</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-02 07:29:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">end_dateVALCHANGES^end_dateISNOTEMPTY^state=-3^NQstart_dateVALCHANGES^start_dateISNOTEMPTY^state=-3^EQ<item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="-3"/><item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="-3"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Change reschedule event</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
	 * Send Approvers and previous start & end date of change as event parm's when event is triggered
	 * 
	 * @method executeRule
	 * @author Dhanalakshmi K [S4GRV8]
	 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
	 * @returns {undefined}
	 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var previousDate = (function () {
		var answer = {};
		answer.planed_start_date = previous.getDisplayValue('start_date');
		answer.planed_end_date = previous.getDisplayValue('end_date');
		return  JSON.stringify(answer);
	})();

	var changeApprover = (function () {
		var changeApprovalUsers = [];
		var grChangeApprovers = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
		grChangeApprovers.addQuery('sysapproval', current.getValue('sys_id'));
		grChangeApprovers.addEncodedQuery('state=requested');
		grChangeApprovers.query();
		while (grChangeApprovers.next()) {
			changeApprovalUsers.push(grChangeApprovers.getValue('approver'));
		}
		return changeApprovalUsers;
	})();

	gs.eventQueue('sr.change.reschedule.notify', current, previousDate, changeApprover);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4GRV8</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-17 09:33:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ba6be32adbfcfb005a31fd161d96196f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Change reschedule event</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ba6be32adbfcfb005a31fd161d96196f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-27 11:24:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ba6be32adbfcfb005a31fd161d96196f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">type=normal^stateCHANGESTO3^EQ<item endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="normal"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Validate all change task closed</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate all change task closed or cancelled before change request close
 * 
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// Add your code here
	
	var changeTasks = new GlideRecord("change_task");
	changeTasks.addQuery("change_request", current.sys_id);
	changeTasks.addActiveQuery();
	changeTasks.setLimit(1);
	changeTasks.query();
	if (changeTasks.next()) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("Please ensure that the Change tasks are closed or cancelled  before proceeding");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-11 12:55:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f473101edbc5e7007193f7b31d9619c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Validate all change task closed</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f473101edbc5e7007193f7b31d9619c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-15 12:13:52</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f473101edbc5e7007193f7b31d9619c3"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a2baa895dbf31700459dfc600f961935
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Utility class for change request client side calls
 * 
 * @class 
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @extends global.module:sys_script_include.AbstractAjaxProcessor
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_include
 */
var SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils = Class.create();
SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, /** @lends global.module:sys_script_include.SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils.prototype */ {

	/**
	 * Get the assignment group based on the configuration id selected on the change request
	 * 
	 * @returns {undefined} Sys ID of Assignment Group Name
	 */
	getAssignmentGroup: function () {

		var ciAssignmentGroup = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci");
		ciAssignmentGroup.addQuery("sys_id", this.getParameter("sysparm_configuration_item_sysID"));
		ciAssignmentGroup.query();
		if (ciAssignmentGroup.next()) {
			return ciAssignmentGroup.getValue("assignment_group");
		} else {
			return "";
		}
	},

	/**
	 * Validate planned start date is future date
	 * 
	 * @returns {String} numeric value of date diff
	 */
	isValidStartDate: function () {

		var startdate = new GlideDateTime();
		startdate.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_plannedStartDate'));

		var currentdate = new GlideDateTime();
		currentdate.setDisplayValue(gs.nowDateTime());

		var sdateinseconds = parseInt(startdate.getNumericValue()) / 1000;
		var cdateinseconds = parseInt(currentdate.getNumericValue()) / 1000;
		return (parseInt(sdateinseconds) - parseInt(cdateinseconds)) < 0;
	},

	/**
	 * Get all groups which user is member of or manger of the group
	 * 
	 * @returns {String} Sysid of the groups
	 */
	getMyGroups: function () {
		var currentUserSysid = gs.getUserID();
		var allMyGroups = [];
		var userGroupRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
		userGroupRecord.addQuery("manager", currentUserSysid);
		userGroupRecord.query();
		while (userGroupRecord.next()) {
			allMyGroups.push(userGroupRecord.getValue("sys_id"));
		}

		var groupMember = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
		groupMember.addQuery("user", currentUserSysid);
		groupMember.query();
		while (groupMember.next()) {

			allMyGroups.push(groupMember.getValue("group"));

		}
		return allMyGroups.toString();
	},

	/**
	 * Get group manager and members based on the Group name selected on catalog item
	 * 
	 * @param {String} sysparm_group Sys Id of the group
	 * @returns {String} JSON string with Group members and group manager
	 */
	getGroupDetails: function () {

		var answer={}; 
		var groupName = this.getParameter("sysparm_group");
		answer.groupMembers = this._getGroupMembers(groupName);
		answer.groupManager = this._getGroupManager(groupName);
		return  JSON.stringify(answer);
	},
	/**
	 * Get all the group members
	 * 
	 * @param {String} groupSysId Sys Id of the group
	 * @returns {String} Comma separated sys ids of members of group
	 */
	_getGroupMembers: function(groupSysId){
		var users = [];
		var grGroupMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
		grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', groupSysId);
		grGroupMembers.addNotNullQuery('group');
		grGroupMembers.query();
		while (grGroupMembers.next()) {
			users.push(grGroupMembers.getValue('user'));
		}
		return users.toString();
	},
	/**
	 * Get group manager
	 * 
	 * @param {String} groupSysId Sys ID of the group
	 * @returns {String} Sys ID of the Manager
	 */
	_getGroupManager: function(groupSysId){
		if (gs.nil(groupSysId)) {
			return '';
		}
		var grManager = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
		grManager.addQuery('sys_id',groupSysId);
		grManager.addNotNullQuery('manager');
		grManager.query();
		if (grManager.next()){
			return grManager.getValue('manager');
		} else {
			return '';
		}
	},

	/**
	 * Get Requested Action which gives informatio about which users are requested to added or removed
	 * 
	 * @returns {String} message
	 */
	getRequestedAction: function(){
		var groupName = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupName");
		var groupMembersVariable = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupMembersVariable");
		var groupManager = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupManager");

		var groupMembersDatabase = (function (groupName, groupManager){
			var groupMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			groupMember.addNotNullQuery('group');
			groupMember.addQuery('group', groupName);
			groupMember.addQuery('user', '!=', groupManager);
			groupMember.query();
			var user= [];
			while(groupMember.next()){
				user.push(groupMember.user.toString());
			}
			return user;
		})(groupName, groupManager);

		var removeMember = groupMembersDatabase.filter(function(userId){
			return (groupMembersVariable.indexOf(userId)==-1);
		});
		var grRemoveMember = this._getUserName(removeMember);

		var addedmembers = groupMembersVariable.toString().split(',').filter(function(userId){
			return (groupMembersDatabase.toString().indexOf(userId)==-1);
		});
		var grAddMember = this._getUserName(addedmembers);

		var message='';
		if (grAddMember.length == 0 && grRemoveMember.length == 0){
			message= '';
		}
		else if (grAddMember.length == 0 && grRemoveMember.length > 0 ){
			message= gs.getMessage('Remove : {0}', [grRemoveMember.join()]);
		}
		else if (grRemoveMember.length == 0 && grAddMember.length > 0 ){
			message= gs.getMessage('Add : {0}', [grAddMember.join()]);
		}
		else{
			message= gs.getMessage('Add : {0} \nRemove : {1}', [grAddMember.join(),grRemoveMember.join()]);
		}

		return message;
	},

	/**
	 * Get user name array 
	 * 
	 * @param {Array} userSysId
	 * @returns {Array} namesArray
	 */
	_getUserName: function(userSysId){
		var namesArray = [];
		var  grUserName = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grUserName.addQuery('sys_id','IN', userSysId);
		grUserName.query();
		while (grUserName.next()){
			namesArray.push(grUserName.name.toString());
		}
		return namesArray;
	},
	type: 'SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils'
});

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-07 08:43:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>a2baa895dbf31700459dfc600f961935</sys_id><sys_mod_count>117</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a2baa895dbf31700459dfc600f961935</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-13 08:17:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_90c86416dbb723405a31fd161d96191b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">stateCHANGESTO-3^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="-3"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Notify Task Assignment groups</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Checks whether the change has tasks, if yes event will be triggered to send notification to CTASk assignment groups
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Dhanalakshmi K [S4GRV8]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var cTask = new GlideRecord('change_task');
    cTask.addQuery('change_request', current.getValue("sys_id"));
    cTask.query();
    while (cTask.next()) {
        gs.eventQueue('sr.ctask.notify', cTask);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4GRV8</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-25 07:45:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>90c86416dbb723405a31fd161d96191b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Notify Task Assignment groups</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_90c86416dbb723405a31fd161d96191b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4GRV8</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-28 08:15:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=90c86416dbb723405a31fd161d96191b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_3399251adb9023005a31fd161d9619a1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">change_requestISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="change_request" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR - Default new change task values</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Populate change request values on change task
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    if (current.isNewRecord()) {

        var nextOrder = (function() {
            var changeTask = new GlideAggregate("change_task");
            changeTask.addQuery("change_request", current.change_request);
            changeTask.addAggregate('MAX', 'order');
            changeTask.groupBy("change_request");
            changeTask.query();
            if (changeTask.next()) {
                var newOrder = 100;
                var order = parseInt(changeTask.getAggregate('MAX', 'order'));
                if (order >= 100) {
                    var rem = 0;
                    rem = order % 100;
                    if (rem == 0) {
                        newOrder = (order / 1) + 100;
                    } else {
                        newOrder = order / 100;
                        newOrder = Math.round((Math.ceil(newOrder)) * 100);
                    }
                }
                return newOrder;
            } else {
                return 100;
            }
        })();

        var change = current.change_request;
        current.cmdb_ci = change.cmdb_ci;
        current.assignment_group = change.cmdb_ci.support_group;
        current.order = nextOrder;
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S02W42</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-04 12:26:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3399251adb9023005a31fd161d9619a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR - Default new change task values</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3399251adb9023005a31fd161d9619a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S02W42</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 06:31:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3399251adb9023005a31fd161d9619a1"/></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: SR - Default new change task values

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ec25535fdbc07f007193f7b31d9619be
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_task">change_task_type=manual_fix^stateCHANGESTO3^ORstateCHANGESTO4^EQ<item endquery="false" field="change_task_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="manual_fix"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="4"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SR- Check if Automated tasks are valid</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Avoid closing the Manual task if reference ID is empty in Automated task which is in Redeploy task related list
 *
 * @method executeRule
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script
 * @returns {undefined}
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

	var changeTasks = (function () {
		var out = [];
		var grChangeTask = new GlideRecord('change_task');
		grChangeTask.addEncodedQuery('created_fromLIKE' + current.getValue('number'));
		grChangeTask.query();
		while (grChangeTask.next()) {
			out.push(grChangeTask.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return out;
	})();

	var invalidAutoTasks = (function () {
		var out = [];
		var grAutoTask = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_task');
		grAutoTask.addQuery('u_valid', false);
		grAutoTask.addQuery('active', true);
		grAutoTask.addQuery('parent', 'IN', changeTasks.join());
		grAutoTask.addNotNullQuery('parent');
		grAutoTask.query();
		while (grAutoTask.next()) {
			out.push(grAutoTask.getValue('number'));
		}
		return out;
	})();


	if (invalidAutoTasks.length > 0) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Please review Automated tasks {0} listed under 'Redeploy Tasks' list before closing this task", invalidAutoTasks.join()));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-13 08:40:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ec25535fdbc07f007193f7b31d9619be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR- Check if Automated tasks are valid</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ec25535fdbc07f007193f7b31d9619be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-22 10:23:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ec25535fdbc07f007193f7b31d9619be"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>ec25535fdbc07f007193f7b31d9619be</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>NUL</language><sys_created_by>S4AXNZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-13 08:40:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>fd951b5fdbc07f007193f7b31d96197b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>S4AXNZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-13 08:40:45</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_script_e842be12dbab6f007193f7b31d961920
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="C3PO - Reference Package">4702fa12dbab6f007193f7b31d961961</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	// On insert, Generate Sys ID based on Unique Key. The same unique key will be used in ITSM instance to generate the same Sys ID
	if (action == 'insert') {
		//Key Prefix. This needs to be same on ITSM instance as the target table name are different on both instances
		var keyPrefix = 'reference_package_';
		
		var sourceRefId = source.getValue('u_reference_id');
		var sourceType = source.getValue('u_type');
		
		//Ignore the insert if Source Reference ID or Type is NULL
		if (gs.nil(sourceRefId) || gs.nil(sourceType)) {
			ignore = true;
			return;
		}
		
		//Generate the unique key text
		var uniqueKey = (function () {
			return keyPrefix + sourceRefId + sourceType;
		})();
		
		//Generate the Sys ID based on the unique key text
		var sysId = new GlideChecksum(uniqueKey).getMD5();
		
		//Check if this sys id is already used
		var sysIdExists = (function () {
			var refPkg = new GlideRecord('x_swre_auto_dep_pkg_itsm');
			if (refPkg.get(sysId)) {
				return true;
			} else {
				gs.warn('Deployment package already present with sys_id {0}. System will generate a new sys id automatically', [sysId]);
				return false;
			}
		})();
		
		//Not taking any action if sys_id already exists as the chance of this happening is very less
		if (sysIdExists) {
			gs.warn('Deployment package already present with sys_id {0}. System will generate a new sys id automatically. \nDeployment package details: \nReference ID: {1} \nType: {2}', [sysId, sourceRefId, sourceType]);
		}
		
		//Set Target record sys id
		if (!gs.nil(sysId) && !sysIdExists) {
			target.setNewGuidValue(sysId);
		}
	}

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7DHWK</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-13 07:05:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>e842be12dbab6f007193f7b31d961920</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SR Change Management" source="b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SR Change Management">b621e5e2dbc12b007193f7b31d961906</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_e842be12dbab6f007193f7b31d961920</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>S7DHWK</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-19 10:21:39</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
